name: RHIZA OMEGA
description:
RHIZA OMEGA

This is a post-jam update for Roots of Power.

Build tiles on the map when you level up, then root yourself into them to gain upgrades and weapons to fend off against an endless wave of enemies.

  • BGM, SFX, particles and screenshake
  • Structured enemy waves and scaling based on player level
  • Player now can switch between weapon types instead of firing all at once
  • Improved UI with gameplay hints
  • Main menu, death screen and high score tracker
  • New weapon and mini-boss
  • Bug fixes
